 Moderated by Carrie Jones @caremjo
 Notes by Yury Lifshits @yurylifshits
Part I. What is a community
1. Community starts with a sense of belonging.
2. Share mockups and ask for feedback. Pre-product audience helps a lot during the launch.
3. Build your product around pre-existing behavior on other services. Itâ€™s very hard to build an entirely new set of behaviors.
4. Frequency of use is hugely important. It is much much easier to build a community around daily-used product than around weekly-used one.
